MENUMENU
  • Products

        • Why Forbes?

          There are variety of reasons to include hedge funds in a portfolio of otherwise traditional investments. The most cited reason to include them in any portfolio is their ability to reduce risk and add diversification. We have mentioned before how many hedge funds claim absolute return mandates whereby returns are minimally correlated with equity market. In such case, hedge funds serve as a great means to diversify, particularly in times of increased market volatility and/or an outright bear market.

HELLO

You may not think it, but cash sitting idle is risky. The risks: Inflation and your own pocketbook. Our cash management tools
help you save more each paycheck and spend when you’re ready

Earn the ForbesCapital Way!

New Investor

I'm new to investing, or am looking for some guidance

Hands-off Investor

I invest, but don't have the time or desire to do it myself

Hands-on Investor

I'm a confident, hands-on investor looking for an optimal solution

Built to help you become a more confident investor and set you on the path to a secure financial future.

Figure out your financial goals.​

We'll ask you some questions to kick off your new financial future. Then, we'll help you figure out what to invest for, like retirement, a big purchase, or simply to build wealth.

Get a sense of your full financial picture.

Depending on what you're investing for, we'll recommend how much you should save, then build you a diversified portfolio to set you on your way.

Benefit from expert advice and technology.

Our cutting-edge technology (guided by our financial experts) manages your investments, and our platform provides ongoing advice to help keep you on track.

Our mission is to help customers maximize their income.

Whether you’re new to investing or a seasoned pro, FCP does what is right for you and your money. On average, our investing principles can increase returns by 2.66% when compared to the typical investor. On average our investing principles can increase returns by 2.66% when compared to the typical investor.

Why ForbesCapital?

Satisfaction guaranteed.

At Forbes Capital, our passion is your investing experience. If you ever feel we've missed the mark, let us know. We'll do everything we can to make it right.

You pay one low, annual fee.

Worried about hidden costs? Nowhere to be found. No matter who you are, you get everything for one low, transparent fee of 0.25% (4X lower than what you'd typically pay for advice).

fcp new referral

Download PDF

Referral Tree

At Forbes Capital Partners we understand that referrals are one of the lifeblood of our company. We encourage our investors to invest TIME into their investment with us to enhance accumulation of profits.

We accept investors from all works of life around the globe. We have created a Marketing System for you that works!

We offer All our marketers an Instant

• 10% bonus of the first and second
investment of their direct referrals

• 2% commission from all downlines up to the 10th Generation of each
chain connected with them.

Our marketers are the reason we are spreading across the globe rapidly and we care to keep them as part of of us for a greater financially sustainable future.


Marketers have the opportunity to earn a salary of $750,000 Annually through our Marketing System.

How it works?

01

We'll learn a bit about you.

Where are you in your financial life and what are you investing for? Dream vacation? Nice little retirement?

02

We'll build you a portfolio.

Based on your answers we’ll recommend an investing plan designed for your risk tolerance and time horizon.

03

We put our magic to work.

And we’ll keep working. Once we get you set up we’ll manage your portfolio with our tax-smart technology.
